Articles.Content:
That's what happens when you do not discover the trick but someone else teaches you ;D

The future builds on the past both through discovery and through teaching. Just because someone took over a project and likes to speak mostly in a character format doesn't mean they are incapable of succeeding. Try to remember that everyone needs help once in a while.

Now get back on topic and stop taking cheap shots at people. The forum rules don't like cheap shots or derailing.

The above serves as an official notice to the thread readers.

The future builds on the past both through discovery and through teaching. Just because someone took over a project and likes to speak mostly in a character format doesn't mean they are incapable of succeeding. Try to remember that everyone needs help once in a while.

Now get back on topic and stop taking cheap shots at people. The forum rules don't like cheap shots or derailing.

The above serves as an official notice to the thread readers.

The problem is that he refuses to help others by showing how things are done but he cries when the trick stops working and he cannot get it working.

If he helpped us by showing us what the trick was, he would now have our help to get it working on the new game version.

With his selfish behaviour all he got is a punch in the face on the new version

The problem is that he refuses to help others by showing how things are done but he cries when the trick stops working and he cannot get it working.

If he helpped us by showing us what the trick was, he would now have our help to get it working on the new game version.

With his selfish behaviour all he got is a punch in the face on the new version

Umm, He did not cry. He was just stating that it was broken. You need to stop trying to say he is the bad guy. The problem is that nobody has ASKED for the trick nicely.

aftokinito, if you are having such an issue with this member, move on. There's no need to argue or try to say who was right or wrong, just move on to the next thread and let it go.

Got it?

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

This thread has wandered far from the original question and is now of questionable value.

I'd suggest that Kragrathea (and/or anyone else working on this) start a new thread once there is something new to show off.
